rationale: 'real' modifies 'challenge'. 'so much' modifies quantity. 'gives me a pit in my stomach' is an idiom.
statement_text: 'The real challenge is whether people, whether governments, whether policymakers have the ability to actually address the challenge in the way that needs to be done. And I [Fukuda] don't see so much which encourages me, to be blunt. And I [Fukuda] don't see so much which encourages me, to be blunt. That's [not seeing encouragement] what gives me a pit in my stomach.'
